What is required to initiate a currency launch in Verus?

To initiate a currency launch in Verus, the currency must be funded with at least 10 VRSCTEST, and 1000 VRSCTEST must be preconverted at a specified rate (in this case, 0.01 VRSCTEST per GOLD) before the launch.

ncy must be funded with at least 10 VRSCTEST before sending the transaction returned from this command to
initiate a currency launch that will start at 50 blocks from when it was made (default), and that must have 1000 VRSCTEST preconverted at 0.01 VRSCTEST per GOLD in order to launch.
all of this happens as part of the mining process, since mining the blocks that launch a currency earn the 0.025% conversion fees of participation
in the launch, converting VRSCTEST to GOLD. I could send the following command before the block where GOLD token launches.
After it launches, the only way at present to create new tokens is with a centralized issuance option. To convert VRSCTEST to GOLD, you could issue the command:
```
./verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"mike@","convertto":"gold","preconvert":1,"amount":100}]'
```
that would effectively park my conversion until the token launches, at which point, I will either find 0.975 GOLD in my wallet, or I will have my VRSCTEST back.
Assuming it launches, and I later want to create mycoin, which can be converted to with either GOLD or VRSCTEST, I can create mycoin with:
./raw_text_input_wiki/release_notes.md
How does the mining process relate to currency launches in Verus?

In Verus, the mining process is involved in currency launches. Mining the blocks that launch a currency earns the miner 0.025% conversion fees of participation in the launch, which involves converting VRSCTEST to the new currency (in this case, GOLD).

ncy must be funded with at least 10 VRSCTEST before sending the transaction returned from this command to
initiate a currency launch that will start at 50 blocks from when it was made (default), and that must have 1000 VRSCTEST preconverted at 0.01 VRSCTEST per GOLD in order to launch.


How can I convert VRSCTEST to a new currency (like GOLD) before it launches, using the command line?

You can convert VRSCTEST to a new currency before it launches by sending a command to park your conversion until the token launches. Here's an example command:
```
./verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"mike@","convertto":"gold","preconvert":1,"amount":100}]'
```
This command will effectively park your conversion until the GOLD token launches. After the launch, you will either find the converted amount of GOLD in your wallet, or you will have your original VRSCTEST amount returned.

What happens if I want to create a new token that can be converted to with either GOLD or VRSCTEST, after GOLD has launched?

If you want to create a new token that can be converted to with either GOLD or VRSCTEST, after GOLD has launched, you can create the new token (let's call it "mycoin") using the command line. You would need to define the properties of mycoin, such as its name, options, proof protocol, currencies, and initial supply.
